title: Competition: Win a dhb Aeron Lab Thermal Jersey worth £120
content:
Cyclist
Competition: Win a dhb Aeron Lab Thermal Jersey worth £120

What’s not to love about curated Cyclist emails direct to your inbox? You can get all the very latest in-depth news on new road and gravel bikes and kit, follow our team on rides across the globe and keep up to speed with all the current news and reviews: from the busy world of pro cycling to expert product guides, we’ve got you covered.        

So, the next time you join your mates for a ride, not only will you sound knowledgeable, but you might even be sporting this brand new dhb Aeron Lab Thermal jersey worth £120!

To go into the draw for a chance to win this great prize, simply sign up to the Cyclist newsletter by clicking here:

The legal bit: Open to UK residents only, entries must be received by 23:59 on 30th April 2023. This competition is being sponsored by dhb. The winner will be selected at random and notified by email in May. Note we do not sell, rent or share your data with third parties without your consent. Metropolis respects the privacy of every person for whom we have personal data. The group privacy and cookies policy can be viewed here. Only new newsletter subscribers will be entered into this prize draw.
